product_name: Primus Solar LED Camp Lantern - 2010 Overstock
long_description: This LED camping lantern uses the unlimited, economical power source of the sun's rays with a rechargeable battery that's powered by a solar panel on the top of the lantern.
short_description: This LED camping lantern uses the unlimited, economical power source of the sun's rays with a rechargeable battery that's powered by a solar panel on the top of the lantern.
